title: PATREON BONUS EPISODE: "Lorena" Episode 1
description:
FAM! This week, as a fun little bonus, we wanted to share with you one of our FAVORITE episodes from our Patreon feed! We think that our coverage of "Lorena" is some of our funniest, most intense, rage-iest work so we wanted to share the first episode on the regular feed! If you'd like to hear the rest, become a part of the Patreon Fam for just $5 per month. If you do that, you'll also get almost 90 FULL BONUS EPISODES to binge right this second! Including our episode-by-episode coverage of "Serial"season 1, "The Jinx," "The Staircase,' and "Making A Murderer." JOIN HERE!

Lorena Episode 1: In the middle of a June night in 1993, a young woman slices off her husband's penis in a seeming fit of rage. John and Lorena Bobbitt's dueling versions of the attack explode into the worldwide media and spill into the courtroom. The nation takes sides as a renewed battle of the sexes feeds a ravenous 24-hour TV news cycle.Â
